question: weird vaginal discharge?
question_content:
hi. im 15. i got my period when i was 10. i started masturbating when i was 14. Just after i period got over, i started spotting. the colour was reddish-brown. it happened randomy for around 3 days. then yesterday i got a white discharge. No discharge today. i am a bit itchy but now in the vagina. i a little itchy in the urethral-clitoral area.
WHATS GOING ON WITH ME?

answers.answer_content: sounds like a yeast infection. The reddish brown you saw was old blood from your period. It sounds like that has passed. Since you have discharge, and it has stopped, and you are itchy  now, it sounds like a yeast infection.

sounds like a yeast infection. you can go to the store and buy creams for that. but when i got a yeast infection i was so embaressed to go to the store so i researched online for some home remedies:

-apply pure lavender oil with a q-tip to the ichy areas

OR

(this sounds gross but it worked for me)
-get some honey.. go to the bathroom and sit on the toilet. then take a generous handful and just apply it to your entire vag area.


ps: if you don't do anything about it the itching will get wayy worse. and you know you have a yeast infection when your discharge is white and looks like cottage cheese. 


gross.. i know =/

If it became in basic terms runny discharge, i could say it became in basic terms your vagina cleansing itself. yet, given the reality which you have severe itching besides, sounds to me such as you have a yeast an infection. in case you're sexually energetic, it may be the beginning up of an STD. circulate on your everyday practitioner and get it regarded at. extra proper secure than sorry.
